label: 御口入地
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Estates on which Kamakura vassals who were not jitō held interests, hence lands over which the Bakufu claimed no jurisdiction. The word kunyū or gokunyū means benevolent intereession," usually of a judicial type.　[地頭、口入、後口入]　"
